notes.purpose: Maps simple Groq model IDs to their HuggingFace equivalents for license detection
notes.usage: Models with '/' in ID are used as-is, others are mapped through this file
notes.meta_models: Meta/Llama models use official Llama license logic, not HuggingFace scraping
notes.fallback: Unmapped models use hardcoded license rules in groq_pipeline.py
